short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly copy HTML element data-{id}/input-id attributes for developers, QA, and designers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly enhance your web development workflow with Inspectify, a powerful Chrome extension designed to copy the data-{id}/input-id attributes of HTML elements with a single click. Whether you're a developer, QA tester, or designer, this tool will streamline your debugging and automation processes by providing quick access to unique element identifiers.

Key Features:
•	Instant Copy: Simply hover over any element and click to copy its data-{id}/input-id to your clipboard.
•	User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design ensures ease of use for all skill levels.
•	Boost Productivity: Save time and reduce errors when working with dynamic elements, forms, and scripts.
•	Lightweight: Minimal impact on your browser's performance.
How It Works:
1.	Install the Extension: Add Inspectify to your Chrome browser.
2.	Activate the Tool: Click the extension icon to enable element inspection mode.
3.	Hover and Copy: Hover over any HTML element, and click to instantly copy its data-{id}/input-id attribute to your clipboard.
4.	Paste and Use: Use the copied data-{id}/input-id in your development tasks, automation scripts, or debugging processes.
Who is it for?:
•	Web Developers: Simplify the process of locating and referencing elements in your code.
•	QA Testers: Enhance your automated testing by quickly retrieving unique element identifiers.
•	Web Designers: Easily identify elements for styling and modifications.
Boost your efficiency and accuracy in web development with Inspectify. Install the extension and start copying data-{id}/input-id attributes effortlessly today!
